verses.verse: And <S%H3548>now<s%>, O you priests, this commandment is for <S%H4687>you<s%>.

If you will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and if you will not <S%H7760>lay<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, I will even <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H3994>curse<s%> upon <S%H779>you<s%>, and I will curse your <S%H1293>blessings<s%>: <S%H779>Yes<s%>, I have cursed them <S%H7760>already<s%>, because you do not lay it to <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

<S%H1605>Behold<s%>, I will corrupt your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and <S%H2219>spread<s%> <S%H6569>dung<s%> upon your <S%H6440>faces<s%>, even the <S%H6569>dung<s%> of your solemn <S%H2282>feasts<s%>; and one shall take you away with <S%H5375>it<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> unto <S%H1285>you<s%>, that my covenant might be with <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> was with him of <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to him for the <S%H4172>fear<s%> with which he <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H2865>me<s%>, and was afraid <S%H6440>before<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>.

The <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> was in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> was not <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H8193>lips<s%>: he <S%H1980>walked<s%> with me in <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H4334>equity<s%>, and did <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

For the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H8193>lips<s%> should <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and they should <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> at his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for he is the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

But you are <S%H5493>departed<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%>; you have caused <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> at the <S%H8451>law<s%>; you have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Therefore have I also <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H959>contemptible<s%> and <S%H8217>base<s%> before all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H6310>according<s%> as you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, but have been <S%H5375>partial<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%>.

Have we not all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>? has not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H898>us<s%>? why do we deal treacherously every <S%H376>man<s%> against his <S%H251>brother<s%>, by <S%H2490>profaning<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%>?

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> has dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and a <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>committed<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; for <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>holiness<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> which he <S%H157>loved<s%>, and has <S%H1166>married<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of a <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H410>god<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H5782>this<s%>, the master and the <S%H6030>scholar<s%>, out of the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and him that <S%H5066>offers<s%> a <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

And this have you <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%>, <S%H3680>covering<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H1832>tears<s%>, with <S%H1065>weeping<s%>, and with crying <S%H603>out<s%>, so much that he <S%H6437>regards<s%> not the <S%H4503>offering<s%> any <S%H3947>more<s%>, or receives it with good <S%H7522>will<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Yet you <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H4100>Therefore<s%>? Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has been <S%H5749>witness<s%> between you and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth<s%>, against whom you have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%>: yet is she your <S%H2278>companion<s%>, and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And did not he <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>? Yet had he the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%>. And therefore <S%H259>one<s%>? That he might <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H430>godly<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>. Therefore take <S%H8104>care<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and let none deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H802>wife<s%> of his <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> that he <S%H8130>hates<s%> putting <S%H7971>away<s%>: for one <S%H3680>covers<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> with his <S%H3830>garment<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: therefore take <S%H8104>care<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, that you deal not <S%H898>treacherously<s%>.

You have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with your <S%H1697>words<s%>. Yet you <S%H559>say<s%>, Where have we <S%H3021>wearied<s%> <S%H559>him<s%>? When you say, Every one that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he <S%H2654>delights<s%> in <S%H430>them<s%>; or, Where is the God of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>?
